document.full_text: with 475 million pounds of tilapia eaten by americans last year, this 'aquatic chicken,' as it is known in the food business, is becoming a big business worldwide ' but environmentalists say the farming processes are damaging fragile ecosystems.
document.title: a once-obscure fish takes center stage on americans' plates
lines_and_colors: with 475 million pounds of tilapia eaten by americans last year, this 'aquatic chicken,' as it is known in the food business, is becoming a big business worldwide ' but environmentalists say the farming processes are damaging fragile ecosystems.
